about_the_game:
"Astiel the Thief" is a visual novel adapted from the fantasy world imagined by Alex Falx©. A true author's game that will transport you into a dynamic and colorful adventure, supported by an original universe and entirely hand-drawn characters!

  • Discover the city of Shaz and the exotic region of Amaad!

  • Make your way through a thrilling story, punctuated by choices that will take you down different paths.

  • Defend your life in turn-based combat, old-school style!

  • Observe, reflect and advance your investigation thanks to a dynamic scenario, enhanced by Point And Click and RPG aspects!

  • Search, collect and use objects to unlock certain areas or dialogues, in sublime and varied screens.

  • Change your character traits and equipment.

Come on Imperial, the world won't wait for us, the mysteries of Amaad are becoming darker.

Carry up your bag and let’s hurry up!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Dual-core processor, 2.0 GHz
  • Graphics: Integrated graphic processor

short_description: We have no news of our agents who went on a mission to Amaad... You are therefore sent to the other end of the Empire, to investigate their disappearance. In this distant world, you will have to observe, think, and find the clues allowing you to carry out your investigation!
